ComicInfo.Title: Magical Beatdown, Vol 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
More magic, more beatdowns!
The second volume of the hyper-violent street harassment revenge fantasy comic. Drawn in the style of Sailor Moon, an average video game-loving schoolgirl transforms into a foul-mouthed and rage-fueled Magical Girl when provoked. Watch in awe as she swiftly disposes of street harassers with her impressive array of magical weapons!
Printed in fluorescent pink and blue ink on thick matte cover-stock. This book can be read on its own or as part of the series.
